transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji
Executive: Madam mujhe na jaise disco mein light hoti hai na
Customer: Haan
Executive: Vaisi lighting ka wo karwana hai, hall ready karwana hai. To kisi ka number mil jayega?
Customer: Matlab kya karwana hai?
Executive: Matlab jaise madam aapne bhi disco mein kaise lighting hoti hai.
Customer: Aap apni company ka name batayenge mujhe kahan se baat kar rahe hain aap?
Executive: Waise to mera IndiaMART pe Aroda Truck Tirpal ke naam se account bhi hai.
Customer: Haan haan
Executive: Lekin mujhe ye apne hotel ke liye ready karwana hai madam.
Customer: Ah hotel ke liye ready karana hai to aapko isme kya chahiye?
Executive: Isme madam jaise aap jaise Gurgaon mein disco wagera jaise Thailand mein hai.
Customer: Haan
Executive: Disco pub wagera usme lighting hoti hai na madam.
Customer: Achcha
Executive: Vaisi lighting wale hall ready karwane hain.
Customer: To wo lights wo vaisi cheez aapko apne profile mein karwani hai?
Executive: Profile mein nahi karwani madam. Mujhe apne hotel pe vaise hall ready karwane hai mere ko unke number chahiye.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Jaise karte hain. Aapke aise koi number hai. Kisi ne aapke paas wo karwa rakha hai aisa kuch.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm IndiaMART pe.
Executive: Hmm
Customer: Main ek baar ye check karke fir main aapko bata deti hu, theek hai?
Executive: Okay madam.
Executive: Okay sir.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants disco-like lighting for his hotel hall.

- Needs contact numbers of relevant vendors.



Resolution:

- Executive will check and provide information.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after checking.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- lighting, hotel, vendors, contact details
